alert.note: Alert for Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 08 at 1:55AM MST until December 08 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow, moderate at times mainly above 6000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches in the mountain valleys with 6 to 10 inches across ridge tops and passes above 6000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 65 mph at times, particularly across ridge tops and in the Yale area. * WHERE...Southern Mountains, including Albion, Malta, and Rockland. * WHEN...Until 2 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
